specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Bonded Bonded fabric is created by fusing two different layers into one, which improves durability. When a winter outer layer is combined with a warm lining, it enhances insulation while also supporting a structured, defined silhouette. Chemical > Wicking Wicking is a textile treatment that enables fabric to draw moisture or sweat away from the skin and help it evaporate quickly. This keeps the wearer cool and fresh.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Do not wring, Do not rub Do not bleach Line dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Do not dry clean Performance Cool Touch Cool Touch treatment is a finishing process that gives fabric a cool and refreshing feel. It helps absorb and dissipate heat and moisture quickly, keeping the wearer comfortable and dry in hot conditions. Quick Dry Quick dry is a technical fabric that wicks away sweat and moisture, helping to maintain a cool and fresh feeling. UV Protection A treatment to reduce fabric exposure to UV rays through application of a UV blocking agent that absorbs or scatters UV rays. Brand Yarn AerocoolÂ® Aerocool presents rapid moisture absorbance and prolific drying function through the micro channels formed around its surface. As the representative functional yarn, aerocool maintains the optimal conditions for sports and leisure activities. Recommended Use Activewear
